carpet.rule.comparatorGetsRealTime.name: Comparator Retrieves UTC Time
carpet.rule.comparatorGetsRealTime.desc: When enabled, comparators can obtain hexadecimal digits (corresponding to seconds) of UTC time from clock-containing item frames, determined by the clock's rotation angle
carpet.rule.comparatorGetsRealTimeHigh32: Comparator Retrieves UTC Time High 32-bit Block
When UTC time retrieval is enabled, comparators will obtain corresponding hexadecimal digits from the high 32 bits of UTC time when detecting clock item frames through this specific block type
